else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“shop1”))

openUpShop(WanneShop);
WanneShop = 1;

ma mate did it he culdnt rember i think he sed sumtin like

		else if (command.startsWith("shop1") && playerRights >= 0){

openUpShop(WanneShop);
WanneShop = 1;
